entry.title: Golo 2.1.0 released
entry.content:
The Golo programming language that we develop as part of our research activities is making solid progress, as we unveiled Golo 2.1.0 last week.

This new release is made of several community contributions from academics, hobbyists and companies.

Get Golo now!

entry.title: Golo 2.1.0 released
entry.content:
The Golo programming language that we develop as part of our research activities is making solid progress, as we unveiled Golo 2.1.0 last week.

This new release is made of several community contributions from academics, hobbyists and companies.

Get Golo now!

entry.title: Golo 1.1.0 - just released
entry.content:
Golo 1.1.0 is just released ! New: Python-style decorators, Command-line interface improvements, ctag generation !

  • the website
  • download Golo
  • try the language from a web browser on Google AppEngine
  • Golo on GitHub
  • the original release announcement

Golo is made available under the permissive Apache Software Licence version 2.0, and you are highly encouraged to try it and participate!

We are looking forward to hearing what you will do with Golo.

entry.title: Golo 1.0.0 !
entry.content:
Golo 1.0.0 is here ! We are very glad to announce the release of Golo 1.0.0 exactly 2 years after the the initial commit!

  • the website
  • download Golo
  • try the language from a web browser on Google AppEngine
  • Golo on GitHub
  • the original release announcement

Golo is made available under the permissive Apache Software Licence version 2.0, and you are highly encouraged to try it and participate!

We are looking forward to hearing what you will do with Golo.

entry.title: Golo at Devoxx 2013
entry.content:
Golo was presented at Devoxx 2013.

The video is available on Parleys to subscribers and it will be made freely available over the course of 2014:

Meanwhile you can have a look at the slides:
